title: Emerald & Diamond Nakshi Haaram with Pearl Drops
materials: Round Cut Diamonds (estimated 5.57 Carat total weight)
features: This exquisite Haaram features intricate nakshi work, blending traditional Telugu craftsmanship with contemporary design. The delicate diamond setting accentuates the sparkle of the stones. Central pendant showcases a floral motif with a vibrant emerald center, complemented by pearl dangles. Each pearl is carefully selected for its luster and roundness.
occasions: or as a statement piece for a special evening event.
description: This Haaram is a harmonious blend of tradition and modernity. The high-quality gemstones, intricate nakshi detailing, and Hyderabadi polish make it a valuable heirloom piece. The design reflects the rich cultural heritage of South India while offering a contemporary touch. A true statement piece for the discerning jewelry collector.
